definition: cleavage of fertilized ovum into cells
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: the eggs are collected before they divide and are injected with the foreign genetic material.
sentences.chinese: 將這些卵收集起來，在其卵裂前注入外來基因物質。

sentences.english: After extrusion of polar body and the completion of the first cell cycle, microfilaments concentrated to the cleavage furrows.
sentences.chinese: 極體排出和第一次有絲分裂時微絲在卵裂溝處富集。

sentences.english: Best Field Indicators are crystal habit , flexible crystals, cleavage and hardness.
sentences.chinese: 最好實地指標是生長習性，靈活的晶體，卵裂及硬度。

sentences.english: Luster is vitreous to pearly especially on cleavage surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 光澤是玻璃體，以珠光，特別是對卵裂表面。

sentences.english: The cells of the blastula, called blastomeres, also each receive a full diploid set of chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這些囊胚細胞，稱卵裂球，每個細胞都有一套二倍體。

sentences.english: The blastomere size and the cleavage speed became different distinctly at the late cleavage.
sentences.chinese: 卵裂後期，卵裂球的大小和卵裂速度均出現差異。

sentences.english: The blastomere size and the cleavage speed became different distinctly at the late cleavage.
sentences.chinese: 卵裂後期，卵裂球的大小和卵裂速度均出現差異。

sentences.english: The blastomere size and the cleavage speed became different distinctly at the late cleavage.
sentences.chinese: 卵裂後期，卵裂球的大小和卵裂速度均出現差異。

sentences.english: This marks the end of the cleavage stage of development.
sentences.chinese: 這標誌着卵裂發育階段的結束。

definition: trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
